system.description:
If a plane has been torn up or broken down and you help the mechanics fix her, roll +skill. On any hit you patch it together and it is no longer damaged. On 7-9 you patch it together but choose two (Protectors choose one):

  • She’ll fly eventually, but not tonight
  • You take 1-harm from lack of sleep
  • You don’t complete the job in the officially approved manner
  • The plane acquires a personality if it doesn’t have one already

failure.label: Miss
failure.value: You are send it into combat still damaged. Maybe that’s obvious and maybe it isn’t.

partial.label: Partial Hit
partial.value:
You patch it together and it is no longer damaged, but choose two (Protectors choose one):

  • She’ll fly eventually, but not tonight
  • You take 1-harm from lack of sleep
  • You don’t complete the job in the officially approved manner
  • The plane acquires a personality if it doesn’t have one already

success.label: Full Hit!
success.value: You patch it together and it is no longer damaged.
